content.rendered:
The Capricorn College consists of:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and course information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • School fees/tuition
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Capricorn College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Capricorn College based on the information provided within it.

Capricorn College Student Portal

Note: Capricorn College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives more detailed information about your application.

Capricorn College Prospectus 2025

The Capricorn College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.capriconcollege.edu.za/
